column2: kable(format = 'markdown', caption = 'Family -- A table showing the count and percentages of taxa per family. data_Count: Number of taxa in the overall data from family X. data_Percentage: Percentage of overall data composed of taxa from family X. tree_Count: Number of taxa in the tree family X. tree_Percentage: Percentage of the tree composed of taxa from family X. total_Percentage: Percentage of all taxa from family X used in the tree.', booktabs = TRUE, longtable = TRUE) %>%
